download.title: Download Your QApp
download.description: Search QApp from Apple Store or Google Play. Or you can click the Badge link below.
link.title: Link Your QEdge
link.description: Go to Home screen of QApp and tap the + button. Scan the QR code below and link your QEdge with QApp
gain.title: Gain The QQQ With Us
gain.description: Link success! Start your personal QEdge naming and styles. Gain QQQ value with now.
